text: A minimal way to embed SQL and safely interpolate user input into it.

elements.text: A minimal way to embed SQL and safely interpolate user input into it.

text: Nice, I was just thinking about this the other week. Does it work with `DBInterface`?

elements.text: Nice, I was just thinking about this the other week. Does it work with

text: The integration side of it isn't worked out yet, but it should.

elements.text: The integration side of it isn't worked out yet, but it should.

text:
The format for the query placeholders is constructed lazily so we should be able to support most (any?) SQL databases.

The only real assumption is that SQL strings use single quotes. We may also support rules for double quotes in the future, possibly.
